mapper.insert: INSERT INTO stock_history (id, company_id, ltp, points_change, percentage_change, open, high, low, stock_market_history_id) VALUES (nextval('stock_history_seq'), #{companyId}, #{request.ltp}, #{request.pointsChange}, #{request.percentageChange}, #{request.open}, #{request.high}, #{request.low}, #{request.stockMarketHistoryId}) ON CONFLICT (company_id, stock_market_history_id) DO UPDATE SET ltp = EXCLUDED.ltp, points_change = EXCLUDED.points_change, percentage_change = EXCLUDED.percentage_change, open = EXCLUDED.open, high = EXCLUDED.high, low = EXCLUDED.low;
mapper.select: SELECT to_char(smh.date, 'Mon DD') as date, sh.ltp as ltp, sh.points_change as pointsChange FROM stock_history sh INNER JOIN stock_market_history smh ON sh.stock_market_history_id = smh.id INNER JOIN companies c ON sh.company_id = c.id WHERE c.scrip = #{scrip} ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
